about_the_game:
Intense, Fast-Paced, and Novel Gameplay


Prepare for an intense battle experience with our unique lane-combat mechanics. In Iconic, you'll face relentless waves of enemies across three horizontal lanes, where your only options are to either place a temporal shield or attack on a lane. Master the frenzy of the fast-paced, yet tactical gameplay that will keep your adrenaline pumping.

Upgrade and Empower Yourself

As you progress through the stages, your weapons and shields will grow increasingly powerful, transforming the battlefield into an arena of brutal devastation. Watch your clicks unleash more and more potent blasts against your foes. Turn your shields into missile firing turrets, light up whole lanes with fire, smash the ground with gigantic hammers and be sure to harvest enough minerals to cover the costs of your neverending upgrade spree.

Deep Meta-Progression

Enjoy a rich meta-progression system featuring numerous unlockable characters, items, upgrades, and encounters. Customize your playstyle and evolve your strategy with each new discovery.


So go ahead, and smash and tackle and beat them up.
And don't feel too bad about it. They are just icons!
